title: Spicy Fried Rice
directions: Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic. Add onions and spring onion bulbs after 30-40 sec.
Add cabbage and carrot and stir fry for a min.
Then put bell peppers and stir fry for another 2-3 min.
Add red chili paste and salt.
Add Soya sauce, rice and spring onion greens and vinegar.
Check salt and stir-fry on high heat for 2-3 minutes.
ingredients: Spring onion white- finely chopped (3 spring onions)
Spring onion greens- round slices (to be added later in the end)
Cabbage- thinly sliced (very thin)- 2/3 cup or more
Green and Red Bell peppers- Finely chopped 1/2 cup (adjust according to your taste)
4 dry red chillies- grind to form a paste
Rice- 1 cup- boiled with salt. (Best is to make rice a night before, and refrigerate)
Vinegar, Soya sauce and green chili sauce- Half to 1 tsp each
